text: Nicolas Puech (born 1943) is a French billionaire heir and businessman, a fifth-generation descendant of Thierry Hermès, and the owner of 6% of Hermès. Nicolas Puech was born in 1943 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, the son of Francis Puech and Yvonne Hermès. He is the brother of Bertrand Puech and the cousin of Jean- Louis Dumas. Puech lives in Martigny, Switzerland. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:French billionaires Category:French businesspeople Category:French expatriates in Switzerland Category:Hermès-Dumas family
title: Nicolas Puech
